summary: Blood types are categorized based on antigens found on red blood cells. These antigens can be proteins, carbohydrates, or other substances. There are 45 known blood group systems, with ABO and Rh being the most crucial. The ABO system has four main types: A, B, AB, and O, while Rh indicates either a positive (+) or negative (-) status. Blood types are inherited from parents and are essential for safe blood transfusions.
title: Blood type
